Summary: Large, wedge-shaped object with four large lights on the bottom flies overhead
trends: There has been one other sighting in Dennis
There were no other sightings in Dennis on or around July 11th 2003
divs: Sighting DetailsI was one of the upstairs bedrooms of the house we were staying in at Cape Cod (Dennis area, reading a book by the window when I spotted movement out of the corner of my right eye. I looked up and dropped my book, wondering if I should call the Local ANG intercept wing or hide under my bed. I didnt really know what to make of this. Above me, outside my window, was a huge, wedge shaped object, with four large, disc-shaped lights on its underside. It flew over the house, east to west direction, stopped in mid air, and began doing a series of aerobatic maneuvers and hovered for a while, then shot off over the horizon. I proceeded to hide under my covers until daybreak, sweating profuseley. The object mereley vanished over the horizon. I was very firghtened, mostly because at the time, I was into the habit of reading abduction horror stories, and had just finished reeading Fire in the Sky.
